data.title: Populate with articles
data.description: Build a knowledge base with a list of answers for common problems and questions related to your product.

data.title: User asks a question
data.description: User can either search the articles, or can submit a question in forum.

data.title: Auto suggestion
data.description: If similar post or article already exists, then shown to user. If user is not satisfied with the suggestion, question is submitted as a post.

data.title: Post answered
data.description: Customer support agent or other users add comment to the post. User marks a comment as answer or replies with further conversation.
